name: sampidia-telegram-app

scripts.start: npx concurrently "npm run start:web" "npm run start:bot"

description: SamPidia Telegram app is for  selling and buying Telegram Stars, with withdrawal from balance function nd read latest posts, chat with friends, use SamPidia Ai. Built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Python 3.7 or higher, python-telegram-bot library, python-dotenv library, and Telegram Bot API, this app includes secure invoice generation, purchase history, secret content access after purchase, and refund processing via a Python companion bot. Ideal for Web3 developers, Telegram bot creators, and digital entrepreneurs looking to monetize through Telegram's payment ecosystem.
